TextView.android:text: Eggplant is a type of fruit that is commonly used as a vegetable in cooking. It is known for its smooth, glossy, and often purple or dark purple skin. The inner flesh can vary in color from white to various shades of green and can have a slightly bitter taste. Eggplant is a versatile ingredient used in a variety of culinary dishesaround the world. It can be grilled, roasted, sautÃ©ed, fried, or used in stews and curries. One popular dish that features eggplant is Eggplant Parmesan, where slices of eggplant are breaded, fried, and layered with tomato sauce and cheese. It is then baked until the cheese is melted and bubbly.Eggplant is a source of fiber, vitamins, and minerals and is often included in vegetarian and vegan diets. Its texture and ability to absorb flavors make it a favorite in many dishes, adding richness and depth to the flavor profiles.
